name: openvoiceproxy-electron
description: Electron shell for OpenVoiceProxy with Windows packaging (NSIS)
author: Will Wade

scripts.build:cli: npx nexe ./cli/CallTTS.js -o dist/CallTTS.exe -t windows-x64-20.17.0 --verbose --build --vcBuild nosign --vcBuild release --vcBuild openssl-no-asm && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ./scripts/patch-cli.ps1 dist/CallTTS.exe
scripts.build:all: npm --prefix ../tts-proxy run build && npm run build:cli && npm run build
